# Interface LLMChatRequestInterface

Structured chat request for language model interactions.

Contains messages, optional tools, tool choice configuration, and response format.

interface LLMChatRequestInterface {  
messages: [LLMMessageInterface](./common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[];  
responseFormat?: [ResponseFormatName](/enums/common_data_types_external_llm_chat_request_data.ResponseFormatName);  
toolChoice?: [ToolChoiceInterface](/types/common_vector_messages.ToolChoiceInterface);  
tools?: [ToolInterface](./common_vector_messages.ToolInterface)[];  
}

##### Index

### Properties

messages responseFormat? toolChoice? tools?

## Properties

### messages

messages: [LLMMessageInterface](./common_vector_messages.LLMMessageInterface)[]

Array of messages in the conversation history.

### `Optional`responseFormat

responseFormat?: [ResponseFormatName](/enums/common_data_types_external_llm_chat_request_data.ResponseFormatName)

Optional specification for the response format.

### `Optional`toolChoice

toolChoice?: [ToolChoiceInterface](/types/common_vector_messages.ToolChoiceInterface)

Optional configuration for tool selection behavior.

### `Optional`tools

tools?: [ToolInterface](./common_vector_messages.ToolInterface)[]

Optional array of tools that the language model can call.

Member Visibility

  * Inherited
